EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Reactor 7AM.Reminder 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Reactor
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for Reactor with Jon Brisbin. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, December 3, 2013 Europe: 3:00pm GMT (London, GMT) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=667911343> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 667 911 343
Thank you,
